SEARCH
Module com.example.loginpage
Package com.example.loginpage.module.books.typeofbooks

Class FictionBook

java.lang.Object
com.example.loginpage.module.books.Book
com.example.loginpage.module.books.typeofbooks.FictionBook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public non-sealed class FictionBook extends Book
Represents a specific type of book, specifically fiction, extending the generic Book class. This class extends Book,includes additional attributes specific to fiction books.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • FictionBook

      public FictionBook(int id, String title, String author, int year, String genre, String description, String imageSrc, int votes, String fictionType)
      Constructs a new FictionBook with specified details. This constructor initializes all fields including the specific type of fiction.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the book.
      title - Title of the book.
      author - Author of the book.
      year - Publication year of the book.
      genre - Genre of the book, typically a subgenre of Fiction.
      description - A brief description of the book.
      imageSrc - Image source URL for the book cover.
      votes - Number of votes or ratings the book has received.
      fictionType - Specific type of fiction.

    • FictionBook

      public FictionBook()
      Default constructor for FictionBook. Initializes a new instance without setting properties, used when properties will be set separately.
